name: Express Inca Trail 2D
description: This exciting express Inca Trail is for people with little time and that don`t want to camp out in the wilderness but still enjoy a hike of 5-6 hours to Machu Picchu.You will take pleasure in visiting the archaeological sites of Wiñaywayna, and enter Intipunku Sungate, the gateway into Machu Picchu. Overnight in Machu Picchu village. The second day, feast your eyes on the astounding Machu Picchu where you will feel the energy of the supernatural complex while enjoying an informative guided tour of the sanctuary.
